Flavor: The ground trembles, as if the cave itself is waking from an ancient slumber.
Name: Echoes

Histories.Title: Echoes in the Cavern
Histories.Description:
In the depths of the enigmatic cave, a group of investigators cautiously advances, illuminating the ancient rock formations with their flashlights in search of clues about the missing team of geologists. The cave, a labyrinth of darkness and hidden secrets, echoes with the sound of their footsteps and the constant dripping of underground water.
 Suddenly, a strange and distant chant reaches their ears, emanating from some hidden corner of the cavern. The sound, hypnotic and disorienting, seems to evoke images of arcane rituals and ancient secrets. At the same time, a gentle but insistent tremor is felt beneath their feet, as if something, or someone, is digging or moving in the unexplored depths of the earth.

Histories.Title: Subterranean Alteration
Histories.Description:
As the investigators progress through the cave, an astonishing and unsettling transformation occurs before their eyes. The rocky walls of the cave begin to crumble, revealing layers of earth and roots intertwining in the space. The ground, once solid and secure beneath their feet, becomes unstable, transforming into an uneven and natural terrain. This metamorphosis defies all logical explanation and geological knowledge.
 Although they are clearly in an underground environment, the investigators strangely perceive fragments and relics of what appears to be a residential structure, scattered among the cave formations. Here and there, they recognize elements reminiscent of a house, such as pieces of furniture, fragments of wallpaper, or even parts of window frames, embedded in the cave walls as if they had been absorbed and fused with the geology of the place.

Flavor: Unseen creatures dart through the shadows, swift and predatory. There’s no time to hesitate—an escape must be found before they close in.
Name: Plunge into Darkness

Histories.Title: In the Unknown Depths
Histories.Description:
In the deepest part of the cave, an unexpected and dangerous twist awaits the investigators. Suddenly, the ground beneath their feet gives way, revealing a vast network of dark tunnels extending into the depths of the underground. Before them, a subterranean world opens up, a realm of darkness and mystery that had remained hidden until now.
 In the shadows of these tunnels, they can make out the forms and silhouettes of unknown creatures moving with speed and agility. These beings, never documented in any text or geological study, seem to be part of an underground ecosystem entirely separate from the surface. Their movements are swift and calculated, as if they are accustomed to navigating this network of darkness.

Histories.Title: The Subterranean Threat
Histories.Description:
In the most unexpected moment, as the investigators cautiously examine the cave's terrain, the ground before them cracks open with surprising violence. From this fissure emerges a nightmare creature: a wild beast with grotesque humanoid features, a face vaguely reminiscent of a canine, and limbs ending in hooves. The appearance of this being, as monstrous as it is fascinating, leaves them momentarily paralyzed.
 Beneath the newly formed opening, a network of tunnels is revealed, extending in all directions, far more vast and complex than they had imagined. These tunnels, seemingly natural but altered by unknown presences, stretch beneath the structure of the house and beyond, into the unknown depths of the earth.
 An infernal howl, seeming to emanate from the very bowels of the earth, echoes through the subterranean caverns, filling the air with a blood-chilling resonance. This sound not only announces the presence of the beast before them but also suggests the existence of more creatures, possibly an entire species inhabiting these dark and forgotten tunnels.

Description:
When the Creature Phase ends, each no-Confront [[Ghoul]] moves 1 Place towards <<01115>>.
When the Round ends, 1<sprite index=40> is removed from <<01107>> for each [[Ghoul]] in <<01112>> or <<01115>>.
Name: Chaotic Rush

Histories.Title: The Chaotic Escape
Histories.Description:
The investigators, still trying to process the appearance of the monstrous creature and the unfathomable subterranean tunnels, are abruptly shaken by a dramatic change in the situation. A deranged howl, echoing from outside the cave, slices through the air like a blade. This sound, filled with madness and desperation, seems to have an immediate and powerful effect on the creatures dwelling in the depths.
 In an instant, all the creatures, including the beast with canine and humanoid features, turn their attention toward the source of the howl. A primal instinct awakens in them, an urgent call they cannot ignore. With frantic and uncontrolled movements, they begin to rush toward the cave's exit, smashing through doors, tearing down obstacles, and creating absolute chaos in their desperate escape.
 The investigators now find themselves in the midst of a wild stampede, where every creature seems determined to flee at any cost. The danger of being trampled or injured in this turmoil is imminent. They must act quickly to avoid being caught in the whirlwind of panic and find a safe way out of the cave while trying to understand what has triggered such an extreme reaction in the creatures.

Histories.Title: Subterranean Emergency
Histories.Description:
In an unexpected and terrifying twist, the investigators find themselves in the midst of a subterranean cataclysm. The cave floor begins to vibrate and tremble violently beneath their feet, a forewarning of an imminent threat. Before they can react, sharp and fearsome claws emerge from the earth, breaking through the ground with immense force.
 The creatures, belonging to a world that defies all logic and human understanding, claw their way through the earth with desperate fervor. Nightmare beings that had remained hidden in the depths now burst forth in a frenzy of activity, emerging from the ground surrounding the investigators on all sides.
 The scene is pure nightmare: everywhere they look, more of these abominations are revealed, breaking the barrier that once separated them from the surface world.
 Terrified and vastly outnumbered, the investigators have no choice but to flee as fast as their legs can carry them. Every second counts as they navigate the labyrinth of tunnels, dodging the emerging creatures and the falling debris around them.

Description: <sprite index=8>: The Investigators may pay <sprite index=38> to <<01108>> to advance it.
Name: Trapped

Histories.Title: Captives of the Collapse
Histories.Description:
The investigators, engulfed in the dim light of a subterranean tunnel, are suddenly caught off guard by a deafening roar. Rocks and earth fall like an unrelenting cascade, blocking the only route back to the surface. The cloud of dust and the rumbling of the convulsing earth mix with their alarmed cries. They are trapped.
 The air, dense and dusty, slowly settles, revealing the magnitude of the disaster. Before them, what was once a familiar path is now a chaotic mass of rocks and debris. Every attempt to move the stones seems to only worsen the blockage, as if the cave itself resists being reopened.

Histories.Title: The Hidden Door in the Cave
Histories.Description:
Deep within the cave, the investigators discover a worn and mud-stained door buried under a layer of earth. Intrigued, they clear it and open it, revealing a staircase descending into an unknown darkness. Cautiously, they begin to descend, but behind them, the door slams shut, trapping them in a narrow underground passage.
 The air is thick with the smell of burnt wood and decay. With their flashlights barely lighting the way, they venture down the passage, where the shadows seem to take on a life of their own. Now, their only option is to move forward, delving into the hidden secrets within this subterranean extension of the cave.

Description: <sprite index=10>: When the Round ends, the Investigators in <<01112>> may pay <sprite index=38> to <<01109>> to advance it.
Name: Obstruction

Histories.Title: The Living Barrier
Histories.Description:
Before them stretches a barrier made of intertwined vines and plants, laced with bright, pulsating crystals. This barrier emits a faint light and seems to vibrate with an unknown energy.
 When the investigators attempt to touch the vines, they feel an energetic repulsion, as if an invisible force is preventing them from passing.

Histories.Title: Breaking the Barrier
Histories.Description:
Remembering the barrel they had discovered in a hidden chamber earlier, they devise a plan. They fill the barrel with fragments of crystals and sharp rocks found in the cave, hoping to create a tool capable of cutting through the vines.
 Cautiously, they begin striking the barrier with their improvised tool. The vines resist at first, but gradually, the crystals in the barrel start to slice through them. With each blow, the vines retreat, reluctant to release their grip, until finally, with a crunch and a whisper of leaves, the barrier gives way, opening a path that had once been jealously guarded.

Description: If <<01116>> is Defeated, <<01110>> advances.
Name: The Guardian of the Cave

Histories.Title: The Guardian of the Cave
Histories.Description:
Inside the cavernous chamber, beyond the now-destroyed barrier, the investigators are confronted by an imposing figure. A man with a severe expression and eyes burning with a fiery hatred stands before them, holding a torch that illuminates his face, etched with the hardships of life in the depths. 'What have you done to my barrier?' he demands, his voice trembling with fury.
 Before the investigators can formulate a response, a chilling scream echoes behind them. Turning around, they witness a spectacular apparition: a creature draped in a robe, with a mask crafted from a deer's skull, emerges from the cave wall as if it were a phantom, moving towards them with an unsettling grace.

Histories.Title: Defending the Cave
Histories.Description: After defeating the masked creature, the shadows recede, and the chaos begins to dissipate, but an oppressive feeling lingers in the air. Dr. Thomas Walker, still holding the torch, reveals his identity, yet shows no sign of relief. His eyes reflect deep concern as he warns in a grave voice: 'What you have done has awakened forces you do not understand. This place must be destroyed entirely, or the threat lurking in the shadows will spread beyond our control.'

Flavor2: Rocks and debris block the path, sealing the only exit. The faint light of flashlights casts unsettling shadows that creep in the darkness. There is no way back.
Name: Collapsed Gateway

Histories.Title: Rockfall Barricade
Histories.Description: Massive rocks and debris have violently collapsed, blocking the entrance and eliminating any clear path back to the base camp. The only light comes from flashlights and lanterns, casting flickering shadows on the stone walls.

Flavor2: The rocky walls of the tunnel fade away, revealing compacted earth and twisted roots intertwining like the veins of a living creature. It feels as if the passage itself is mutating...
Name: Transmuted Tunnels

Histories.Title: Underground Passage
Histories.Description: The rocky walls of the passage begin to show signs of transformation. The stony floor slowly morphs into a path of compacted earth, while the cavern walls reveal patches of mud and intertwined roots. This shift in the environment gives the impression of having entered a different realm, as if the cave is leading into a space or dimension beyond the familiar.

Flavor: The cavern ascends in a steep slope, with sharp rock walls rising high, covered in shadows and jagged lines.
Description2: After an Investigator enters <<01113>>, {{he}} takes 1<sprite index=60>.
Name: North Chamber

Histories.Title: Elevated Chamber
Histories.Description:
As they approach this elevated area, a foul and penetrating stench fills the air, evoking the scent of decaying flesh and heightening a sense of unease and alertness. The elevated chamber, clearly formed by natural processes, shows signs of having been altered over time, possibly by ancient cave dwellers or enigmatic forces.
 Inside the chamber, a chilling and startling scene is revealed. Hanging from a rocky formation on the ceiling is the bloodied corpse of a deformed creature, suspended grotesquely as if it were meat in a slaughterhouse. The creature's blood drips slowly, accumulating in a small natural basin on the floor, formed by the cave's own rocks.
 The sight of this corpse and its macabre display stirs a mix of horror and questions. Curiosity arises about the nature of the creature, how it ended up in that place, and the possible significance behind its presence.

Flavor: A narrow rocky passage stretches into darkness, faintly lit by a distant glow. The cold, heavy air holds an unsettling silence.
Description2: After an Investigator enters <<01114>>, {{he}} takes 1<sprite index=59>.
Name: South Chamber

Histories.Title: Frozen Descent
Histories.Description:
The rocks and natural formations used as steps in this descent are coated with a thin layer of ice, making them dangerously slippery. The air becomes noticeably colder as they approach this area, a surprising change given the usual temperature of the cave.
 Instead of a continuation of the rocky cave, an extensive network of tunnels and caverns completely covered in ice is revealed. The ice formations and stalactites glisten under the light of the lanterns, creating a captivating landscape.
 The cold in this area is intense, penetrating deeply. The air, nearly frozen, creates an environment that blends beauty with danger.

Description: <<01115>> is blocked. The Investigators cannot move here.
Description2: Escape: {{The Investigator}} leaves the Scene.
Name: Clogged Chamber

Histories.Title: The Luminous Threshold
Histories.Description: This place serves as a transition area between the already explored sections of the cave and the barrier. The atmosphere in this zone is calmer, though infused with a latent energy. A light emanating from within the space provides partial illumination of the vestibule, casting a play of shadows on the walls.

Description: <<01116>> counterattacks when an Investigator attack fails against him.
Name: Necrotic Preacher

Description:
All Investigators at <<01117>>'s Place get +1<sprite index=54>.
<sprite index=10> : When a [[Monster]] is successfully attacked at <<01117>>'s Place, it may deal +1<sprite index=59>.
Name: William Harrow

Flavor: Their hunger is felt even before seeing their eyes.
Name: Cave Rat Fiend

Flavor: In the icy void of the cave, where death itself seems to have left its mark on the scattered bones, the creature lurks.
Name: Frozen Rat Fiend

Description: Escape: {{The Investigator}} leaves the Scene with the information {{he}} is gathered.
Name: Whispers Beneath the City

Histories.Title: Cultists in the Shadows
Histories.Description: Dr. William Harrow is convinced that an unfathomable darkness envelops the city of Arkham, a conspiracy that defies all logic. According to him, a secret cult worships ghouls, grotesque beings that dwell in the crypts beneath the city, feasting on the remains of the dead. He firmly believes that several of the leaders of this cult are hiding among the citizens, camouflaged under an ordinary appearance. When the investigators begin their search, an unsettling feeling overtakes them: they are not the only ones stalking the night... they too are being watched, hunted by someone or something lurking in the shadows.

Histories.Title: The Shrouded Assassin
Histories.Description: In a dark, rain-soaked street, the investigators watch as a figure emerges from the gloom, like a specter pulled from the darkest corners of their nightmares. Under the faint light of a streetlamp, its silhouette looms over them, wrapped in a long coat dripping water in sync with its calm breathing. Its face, hidden behind a mask that evokes death itself, seems to survey the surroundings with chilling indifference. In the distance, the shadows writhe, restless, as if something unnatural is taking shape. The air is heavy with a disturbing calm, broken only by the echo of raindrops crashing against the ground. In that moment, the whispers beneath the city grow louder, and the investigators feel they are not alone.

Description: While a Investigator is confronted with <<01121>>, that Investigator cannot discover or spend <sprite index=38>.
Name: Shrouded Assassin

Description: Escape: {{The Investigator}} leaves the Scene with the information {{he}} is gathered.
Name: Secrets Below the City

Histories.Title: Echoes of Lost Time
Histories.Description: The distant clock tower chimes the passing hours with an unsettling rhythm, yet for the investigators in Arkham’s narrow alleys, time behaves in strange ways. As they press on in their search for answers, moments slip through their fingers like sand, and with each new discovery, the sense of urgency deepens. It feels as though the city itself is toying with them, speeding up and slowing down time at its whim, dragging them inexorably toward an inevitable conclusion.

Histories.Title: Echoes of the Clock
Histories.Description: Twelve chimes ring out across the city. It is midnight. The echo of each strike reverberates through the dark corners of Arkham, a stark reminder that time has run out. There is no more room for investigation, no more clues to follow. The investigators know this: now they must act, making hasty decisions based on the fragmented and terrifying information they have extracted from the cultists they encountered. The air grows heavier, thick with a macabre sense of anticipation. Whatever lurks in the depths of the city is about to be unleashed.

Description:
<sprite index=9> : The Investigators may pay <sprite index=38> to <<01123>> to reveal a [[Cultist]].
 When 6 revealed [[Cultist]] have been defeated, <<01123>> advances.
Name: Night of the Cult

Histories.Title: Under the Shadow of Midnight
Histories.Description: The investigators have only one night to locate the members of the cult and unravel their dark plans. Every second is crucial. The more cultists they manage to find and interrogate before the chimes signal midnight, the greater their chances of stopping what has been unleashed. Time moves mercilessly, and the shadow of the ritual looms ever closer, wrapping Arkham in an atmosphere of inevitable doom

Histories.Title: Truth in the Shadows
Histories.Description:
The investigators successfully uncovered the true identities of all the main leaders of the cult in Arkham. The man who had been stalking them for days was nothing more than a fanatic, fully devoted to the cult’s dark beliefs, just like Herman, the sinister cemetery caretaker, who was entirely committed to the cause. However, not all shared this blind devotion. Some, like Ruth, the mortuary technician, had been forced to participate under terrible threats. They had told her they would kill her family if she didn’t supply fresh corpses for the ghouls. The investigators acted quickly and managed to get her out of the hospital before it was too late.
Peter, the professor, had also been caught in the web of the conspiracy, but he was easily convinced that his involvement would only bring more harm to the city. Victoria, on the other hand, had succumbed to the cult due to her obsession with hidden artifacts, unaware of the danger surrounding her. Finally, Drew, confined to the asylum, attacked them—not out of loyalty to the cult, but because he mistakenly believed the investigators were part of it.
With each new revelation, the investigators realized that this dark conspiracy had destroyed many lives. What began as a search for answers had turned into a grim discovery: the cult had not only sown terror in Arkham but had also forced many into submission or despair, leaving a city teetering on the brink of madness in its wake.

Flavor: The mouth of the cave, dark and silent, seems to watch the investigators with resentment.
Description2: Once per Turn <sprite index=9> : {{The Investigator}} draws 1 card and gains 1<sprite index=39>.
Name: Cave Entry

Histories.Title: Cave Entry
Histories.Description: The mouth of the cave, dark and silent, seems to watch the investigators with resentment. The echoes from within whisper memories of horrors not so distant, as if the very rock were trying to warn them not to return. Although the entrance was meant to be sealed forever, a moment of doubt prevented its destruction. Now, the path no longer descends into the darkness, but instead leads back to the city of Arkham, where an air heavy with mystery awaits their steps… and something else lurks, beyond the stone and the silence.

Flavor: The air is thick, laden with the stench of stagnant waters that wind between rotting docks.
Flavor2: The streets warp beneath their feet, and the reflection of the dark river water hints at impossible, twisted shapes.
Name: Blackwater District

Histories.Title: Blackwater District
Histories.Description: As the investigators cross into the Blackwater District, a veil of unease envelops them. The streets warp beneath their feet, and the reflection of the dark river water hints at impossible, twisted shapes. The air is thick and suffocating, while the splash of something unknown breaks the silent atmosphere. Their steps become more cautious, for an intangible presence seems to watch them from the shadows and from the waters, waiting in the depths.

Flavor: Still holds vestiges of Arkham's ancient grandeur, with majestic mansions towering imposingly over the cobblestone streets.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} draws 3 cards.
Name: Founders' District

Histories.Title: Founders' District
Histories.Description: As the investigators venture into the Founders' District, they are enveloped by a thick atmosphere of abandonment. The once-majestic mansions now stand as empty shells, seeming to watch from their dust-covered windows. A distant echo resonates along the deserted streets, as if the footsteps of the past refuse to fade away. There is something in the air, a murmur of ancient times and forgotten secrets, waiting to be unearthed.

Flavor: Once a refuge for weary travelers, is now a place where tales from the road intertwine with darker whispers.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} chooses and draws an [[Ally]] from {{his}} deck.
Name: Grayson's Inn

Histories.Title: Grayson's Inn
Histories.Description: As the investigators open the door to Grayson's Inn, a wave of stale air and dampness greets them. The creaking of the floorboards beneath their feet seems to echo throughout the building, as if awakening ancient spirits. The shadows in the corners are thick, almost tangible, and the few guests inside avert their gaze, maintaining an unsettling silence. The atmosphere is heavy with a sense of watchfulness, as if the building itself refuses to reveal its secrets so easily.

Flavor: The halls, filled with the scent of disinfectant and stale medicines, are cold and desolate.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} heals 3<sprite index=36>.
Name: Greywood Medical Center

Histories.Title: Greywood Medical Center
Histories.Description: As the investigators cross the doors of Greywood Medical Center, an unusual cold envelops them, as if the very building were rejecting their presence. The deserted hallways amplify every echo, and the flickering lights cast unsettling shadows on the walls. As they advance, a growing sense of oppression takes hold of them, as though something unseen watches from every corner. Here, relief feels as distant as the whispers echoing in the darkness.

Flavor: Those who venture too deep into the forgotten corners of this library risk more than just their sanity.
Description2: <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} chooses and draws a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] from the top 6 cards of {{his}} deck.
Name: Miskatonic Library

Histories.Title: Miskatonic Library
Histories.Description: As the investigators cross the threshold of the Miskatonic Library, a heavy silence descends upon them. The towering shelves seem to stretch into infinity, filled with dusty volumes whose titles whisper forbidden secrets. The dim, yellowish light barely illuminates the shadows, which seem to move on their own. Somewhere, beyond the reach of sight, the faint whisper of a page turning echoes, but there is no one in sight...

Flavor: It radiates an imposing authority, with high ceilings and marble columns that seem to watch from above.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} gains 3<sprite index=39>.
Name: Whateley Financial House

Histories.Title: Financial House
Histories.Description: As the investigators cross the threshold of the Financial House, an unnatural stillness envelops them. The sound of their footsteps seems to be swallowed by the walls, and the shadows of the columns stretch unnaturally under the flickering light. The few employees present avoid eye contact, their faces tense, as if they know more than they are willing to admit. Here, transactions are not measured in gold alone, but also in favors and secrets that should never be uncovered.

Flavor: Behind its thick stone walls, the echoes of whispers and stifled screams endlessly resound.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} recovers 3<sprite index=37>.
Name: Greystone Sanatorium

Histories.Title: Greystone Sanatorium
Histories.Description: As the doors of the Greystone Sanatorium open, a cold draft escapes from within, carrying the distant echo of whispers. The long, dimly lit hallways seem to stretch on endlessly, as if the building itself is trying to confuse those who enter. The empty stares of the patients fix on the investigators, but none of them utter a word. In this place, time seems to have stopped, and hope fades as quickly as the echo in the empty hallways.

Flavor: The cobblestone streets echo under the footsteps of those who still pass through this forgotten neighborhood.
Description2: While {{the Investigator}} is in <<01132>>, the play cost of each [[Ally]] is reduced by 2<sprite index=39>.
Name: Ironwood District

Histories.Title: Ironwood District
Histories.Description: As the investigators venture into the Ironwood District, they are greeted by an unsettling silence. The old factories, with their crumbling smokestacks, stand like sleeping giants, watching over the deserted streets. A faint creak echoes in the distance, but no one is in sight. The shadows of the buildings seem to move on their own, and the air is thick with a sense of latent menace. Here, the past is not as dead as it seems.

Flavor: ...where ancient tombstones lie covered in moss, and the roots of trees desperately entwine around the bodies buried beneath the earth.
Description2: After an Investigator enters <<01133>>, {{he}} makes a Challenge 3<sprite index=57>. If the Challenge fails, {{the Investigator}} must either take 2<sprite index=60> or move to <<01125>>.
Name: Greyhill Cemetery

Histories.Title: Greyhill Cemetery
Histories.Description: As the investigators cross the threshold of Greyhill Cemetery, a chilling air envelops them. The crooked tombstones jut out from the ground like sharp teeth, and the crunch of dry leaves beneath their feet echoes too loudly in the silent setting. From the shadows among the trees, something seems to watch them, motionless yet vigilant. With each step, they feel heavier, as if the cemetery itself were trying to hold them back... or perhaps, as if the dead were seeking company.

Flavor: Here, Arkham's powerful exchange whispers full of secrets over glasses of brandy, while the shadows of old betrayals slip furtively between the velvet curtains.
Description2: Once per Game <sprite index=9> Spend 5 resources: Gain 2 clues from the token pool.
Name: Upper Ward

Histories.Title: Upper Ward
Histories.Description: As footsteps echo on the frozen sidewalks of the Upper Ward, the air grows thick, as if the very walls of the ancient mansions are watching. The streetlights cast elongated shadows, distorting shapes until they become unrecognizable. Here, where the men of power shape Arkham’s destiny, something older than any dynasty is about to emerge. The overwhelming silence is broken by a distant whisper, barely perceptible, like the echo of a conversation you were never meant to hear.

Description: {{The Investigator}} is Isolated and must choose one: spend 1<sprite index=38> or take 2<sprite index=59>.
Name: Creeping Shade

Description: If {{the Investigator}} has no <sprite index=38>, draw another Danger Card. Otherwise, {{he}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=56>4. For each point {{the Investigator}} fails by, drop 1<sprite index=38> on {{his}} Place.
Name: Erroneous Evidence

Description: When <<01137>> attacks, he heal 1 <sprite index=36> from him.
Flavor: Drew is a longtime patient at Arkham Asylum. Rumor has it {{he}} was locked up for committing cannibalism several years ago. {{He}} is considered extremely dangerous.
Name: Cannibal Madman

Description: Talk: {{The Investigator}} discards 4 cards and <<01138>> is defeated.
Name: Victor the Gravedigger

Description: Talk: <<01139>> is defeated.
Name: Dr. Cyrus Keane

Description: Talk: <<01140>> is defeated.
Name: Eleanor Blackwood

Description: After <<01141>> is evaded, she is defeated.
Name: Miriam the Morgue Custodian

Flavor: The swamp unfolds before them like a twisted maze of stagnant waters and deformed trees
Name: The Swamp

Histories.Title: The Swamp
Histories.Description:
The swamp unfolds before them like a twisted maze of stagnant waters and deformed trees. After interrogating members of a dark conspiracy in Arkham, the investigators discovered that a strange ritual will take place in this place forgotten by time. They venture into the damp and shadowy depths of the swamp, hoping to stop the ceremony before something even more sinister is unleashed.
The atmosphere is stifling and heavy, as if the very air is laden with the whispers of ancient slumbering forces. The thick mud clings to their feet, slowing their progress, while the stench of decay permeates every corner of the landscape. There is no breeze to relieve the sticky heat, and the shadows between the trees seem to move of their own accord. The only sound accompanying their advance is the echo of their own footsteps, occasionally interrupted by a steady dripping coming from deep within the swamp.
In the distance, the faint glow of a torch signals that they are not alone. The stagnant waters reflect the pale light, distorting shapes and creating specters that dance at the edges of their vision. Every fallen trunk, every exposed root, seems to harbor a dark secret, a remnant of what has transpired in this place over the centuries.
The swamp is eerily silent, as if it waits, in spectral muteness, for the arrival of its victims.

Histories.Title: The Call of Khar'gath
Histories.Description:
A piercing scream shatters the funereal calm of the swamp, reverberating among the twisted trees and the suffocating mist floating above the stagnant waters. The very earth seems to tremble upon hearing it. The investigators come to an abrupt halt, their hearts pounding frantically, sensing the imminent danger looming over them.
From the depths of the swamp, a chorus of grotesque voices responds to the call, each more horrifying than the last. These are dissonant, broken voices, laden with an indescribable malevolence. They are not mere echoes of the original scream, but something far more terrifying. The sound they produce has an inhuman timbre: a growl that fuses with an ancient, primal language full of hatred. It is like the bark of a foul beast, yet at the same time it whispers with cursed clarity, repeating a single word:
'Khar'gath... Khar'gath... Khar'gath...'
The name resonates in the heavy air like an ancient curse, charged with power and despair. The shadows between the trees seem to lengthen and twist, responding to that invocation, moving in a nightmare dance. The swamp, which before seemed merely hostile, now feels alive, aware, an entity breathing malice and darkness.
The name continues to echo, growing louder, closer, as if the swamp itself is calling to its master. The investigators feel an invisible pressure crushing them from all angles, the air becoming nearly unbreathable, as something immense and terrible begins to awaken'

Description: Each enemy gets +1<sprite index=54> and +1<sprite index=55>.
Name: The Chanting Grows

Histories.Title: The Chanting Grows
Histories.Description:
The swamp, engulfed in a thick, cursed mist, seems to breathe with a life of its own. From its darkest corners, eerie chants rise: 'Khar'gath... Khar'gath...'. The stagnant waters, saturated with a pungent stench, stir faintly, as if an unseen presence were awakening in the depths. The twisted branches of the trees reach up toward the night sky, while a blanket of black clouds swallows the few stars that still illuminated the swamp.
The whispers turn into piercing screams that echo through the rotting reeds. The atmosphere becomes dense, suffocating; a sense of primordial terror looms over every living being. The enemies, swamp creatures transformed by the dark power emanating from the ritual, grow stronger. Their deformed bodies rise with renewed fury; their movements are more agile, more lethal. Even the shadows ally with them, granting them a wild and unknown power.
In this corner of Arkham, where decay consumes everything, the ritual has begun.

Histories.Title: Unseen Terror
Histories.Description: An ominous presence approaches, and the investigators feel an invisible pressure forcing them down, compelling them to kneel. A terrifying force tries to invade their minds and souls, twisting their deepest thoughts. Their throats tighten, and their eyes fill with tears, as a supernatural burning sensation consumes them from within—an indescribable feeling that pierces through reality itself.

Description2: If <<01157>> is Defeated, <<01145>> advances.
Flavor: Vengeance is near.
Name: The Final Hour

Histories.Title: The Final Hour
Histories.Description:
The swamp twists beneath a sky covered in clouds that seem to weigh down on the world, crushing it with their dense and ominous shroud. The stagnant waters barely stir, but the air is charged with an energy that makes the skin of those who dare to breathe in this place, forgotten by time, tingle. The creatures of the mire watch from the shadows, their eyes faintly glowing, while the ancient trees creak under an invisible strain.
At the center of this cursed landscape, a group of hooded figures murmurs forbidden words in an ancient tongue, a litany that resonates with the cracking of bones and echoes from other worlds. Their voices rise in unison, like a profane choir calling to something beyond reason, something that waits in the darkest corners of the cosmos.
The branches part away from them, as if nature itself were trying to flee from the ritual being performed. But it is futile. The ritual must be completed. The air grows cold in an instant, and an overwhelming sense of impending terror looms over the swamp. Something awakens. Something waits.
Vengeance is near.

Histories.Title: End of All Things
Histories.Description: The presence of Khar'gath manifests in all its power: an indescribable entity crawling from the depths of reality itself. Its twisted form, an amalgamation of tentacles and shadows, seems to devour the light around it, plunging the world into a darkness beyond human comprehension. The chants cease, and a deadly silence floods the air as the entity waits, motionless yet filled with a palpable malevolence. The investigators know that facing this abomination is their only chance to save Arkham, though their sanity may not survive the encounter.

Flavor: The swamp seems to hold its breath...
Name: On the Ritual's Path

Histories.Title: On the Ritual's Path
Histories.Description: The shadows of the twisted trees stretch over the stagnant waters of the swamp as the investigators venture deeper into the thicket. The air is heavy, saturated with a foul stench; each step they take on the damp, muddy ground echoes like a muffled crack, almost a whispered warning. The branches, covered in moss and cobwebs, seem to reach out toward them, as if nature itself were trying to halt their progress. The mist hovering over the waters barely allows them to see more than a few meters ahead, concealing whatever lurks beyond. The swamp seems to hold its breath, waiting for the dark ritual’s inevitable outcome.

Histories.Title: Symbols of the Occult
Histories.Description: The air grows heavier, and the threat emanating from the ritual is almost palpable. Something terrible is about to be unleashed from the depths of the swamp.

Description: If an investigator enters <<01156>>, ad<<01147>> advances.
Name: Sentinels of the Swamp

Histories.Title: Sentinels of the Swamp
Histories.Description:
Venturing into the heart of the swamp, the investigators move cautiously as the mist closes in around them, turning the landscape into a shadowy labyrinth. The twisted trees, covered in moss and vines, rise like ancient guardians, their branches forming grotesque silhouettes in the gloom. The muddy ground gives way beneath their steps, and a pungent stench lingers in the air, saturated with the corruption that hides within.
In the distance, between the shadows, hooded figures can be glimpsed. The cultists, aware of the investigators' presence, have taken positions, blocking the only path to the ritual. The air is thick with tension, and barely audible chants mix with the soft murmur of the stagnant waters. They know time is running out, and beyond these sinister sentinels, something far worse awaits their arrival.

Histories.Title: The Breath of the Abyss
Histories.Description:
As they cross the threshold of the cave, an unnatural cold envelops the investigators. The air, dense and heavy, seems to gnaw at their skin, and a nauseating stench fills the space: a repugnant mixture of spilled blood and decaying flesh. The silence is absolute, save for the distant echo of dripping water resonating in the darkness, like an irregular heartbeat coming from the depths.
The cavern seems to breathe, its atmosphere saturated with death and despair, as the footsteps of the intrepid adventurers crunch on the debris and forgotten remains that cover the ground. The feeling that something is watching them intensifies with each step, as if the very shadows harbored a malevolent presence, waiting for the precise moment to reveal itself in all its monstrous glory.

Description: <sprite index=9><sprite index=38>: {{The Investigattor}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=55>3 or <sprite index=57>3 . If the Challenge succeed, {{the Investigattor}} pays 1<sprite index=38> on <<01148>>.
Name: Interruption of Shadows

Histories.Title: Interruption of Shadows
Histories.Description: The cavern rumbles with the murmur of dark chants. The candles flicker, casting shadows that seem to twist and dance with a life of their own as the ritual nears its climax. Undoing the magic woven into the air, heavy with power, is crucial, but with each passing second, the investigators draw closer to catastrophe.

Histories.Title: The Ritual Undone
Histories.Description:
Facing the icy, supernatural air that seems to cut to the bone, the investigators cautiously advance among the arcane symbols covering the swamp floor. With each step, the inscriptions glow with a sickly light; yet, they manage to cross the threshold of the ritual circle. Wasting no time, they begin erasing the markings traced in the mud, covering them with dirt and damp moss, disrupting the careful design of polished stones that channeled the dark power.
A sharp scream, like the grinding of a thousand spectral voices, pierces the air and stabs their ears. The pressure in the atmosphere shifts abruptly; the air warms suddenly, and for a moment, the world around them seems to twist and collapse. Then, as quickly as it began, the distortion dissipates, and the surroundings return to normal, though the lingering feeling that they have altered something far greater than they can imagine hangs in the air.

Flavor: The swamp never releases its prey easily.
Description2: Escape: {{The Investigator}} leaves the Scene, abandoning Arkham to its grisly fate.
Name: Muddy Path

Histories.Title: Muddy Path
Histories.Description: The thick mist swirls slowly as the investigators struggle. The swamp seems to have a life of its own, and the muddy ground gives way beneath their feet with each step, emitting an unsettling sucking sound. The damp air seeps into their lungs, and the distant croaking of unseen creatures reverberates in the darkness. The shadows shifting in the mud seem to follow them, but each time they try to focus on them, they vanish like whispers in the mist. Something is lurking, something not of this world, and the investigators feel it in their bones: the swamp will not let them go easily.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: After {{the Investigator}} enters <<01150>>, {{he}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=57>4. If the Challenge fails, {{the Investigator}} takes 1<sprite index=59> and 1 <sprite index=60>.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Desecrated Bog
Histories.Description: When the investigators arrive, a feeling of unease tightens around their chests. The mist, thick as a shroud, swirls silently over the dark waters, hiding what lies beneath the surface. A stench of death and decay fills the air, and the sound of something splashing in the distance echoes like a warning. As they step into the swamp, the muck clings to their legs, as if the ground itself were trying to drag them into its depths. The echo of ancient chants reverberates in their ears, though no one is in sight—only the bog... and what still dwells within.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: When {{the Investigator}} moves out of <<01151>>, {{he}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=56>3. If the Challenge fails, the move is canceled.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Deceitful Road
Histories.Description: The path winds through the swamp like a lurking viper, each twist and turn more disorienting than the last. The gnarled trees loom ominously over the investigators, their branches intertwining as if trying to block their way. What initially seemed like a clear path soon dissolves into the mist, and the travelers find themselves circling, unable to discern where solid ground ends and the swamp begins. Treachery lurks in every shadow, in every step that sinks deeper into the muck.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: <<01152>> is investigated using <sprite index=57>.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Desecrated Refuge
Histories.Description: When the investigators arrive, a wave of revulsion washes over them. A old structure teeters at the edge of the swamp, its blackened, moss-covered walls as if they have witnessed centuries of horrors. The air is colder here, and the silence is deafening. Inside, the shadows stretch unnaturally, as if something ancient and cursed lurks within the cracks of the floor and the rotting walls. Remnants of profane rituals and indelible bloodstains adorn the interior, while a distant echo, perhaps a scream drowned by time, rings in their ears.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: <<01153>> is investigated using <sprite index=55>.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Shadowed Peak
Histories.Description: The investigators stop at the edge of a cliff, where the cold, damp wind from the swamp merges with the unsettling silence of the heights. The mist swirls at their feet, obscuring the abyss below, while above, twisted shadows seem to circle. Inscriptions of ancient profane rituals are carved into the nearby rocks, and scattered remnants of melted wax and bones suggest that something dark happened here not long ago. The ascent is treacherous, and each step seems to bring them not only closer to the physical edge but also to the brink of madness.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: This location is investigated using [combat] instead of the skill indicated by the investigation attempt.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Overgrown Mire
Histories.Description: As they venture, the investigators become ensnared in a tangle of roots and branches that seem to have a life of their own, intertwining into a maze with no exit. The ground is muddy and treacherous, and each step emits a sucking sound, as if the swamp is trying to devour those who dare to cross its domain. The vegetation is so dense that it barely allows any light to pass through, shrouding the area in a constant gloom. Strange shadows slip between the trees, though it's hard to tell if they are real creatures or mere tricks of the mind, which begins to falter under the oppressive atmosphere.

Flavor: The dense fog hovers over the water, and a stench of decay fills the air, making every breath an effort.
Description2: Once per Turn <sprite index=9>: {{The Investigator}} heals 1<sprite index=59> or recovers 1<sprite index=60>.
Name: Swamp

Histories.Title: Silent Clearing
Histories.Description: Upon arrival, the investigators experience a strange relief at the sight of a small clearing in the midst of the dense swamp. The air, though heavy with humidity, feels lighter here, and the twisted trees part to allow a faint, soft light to pass through. There is no breeze, no sound of animals. Everything remains still, as if this corner of the swamp is frozen in time. At first glance, it seems like the perfect place to rest, but something about the absolute silence feels... wrong, as if the swamp is holding its breath, waiting for the right moment to act.

Flavor: The echoes of ancient rituals have not faded... they are merely waiting to be heard once again.
Description2: At the end of the round, <01156> restores all <sprite index=38>.
Name: Cultist Chamber

Histories.Title: Cultist Chamber
Histories.Description: The air grows thick, laden with a metallic, rancid stench, as if the blood spilled centuries ago still soaked into every stone. The walls are covered in hand-carved symbols, their edges blurred by time but no less unsettling. A distant whisper, impossible to pinpoint, seems to rise from the heart of the cavern. In the center, surrounded by skulls and remnants of ancient offerings, lies a worn altar, stained by countless dark rituals. The silence here is not natural; it feels as though the very place is waiting… for another sacrifice.

Description: At the end of each investigator's turn, <<01157>> ready
Name: Khar'gath the Bottomless

Description: {{The Investigator}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=57>5. For each point {{the Investigator}} fail by, {{he}} must choose one: Discard a card from {{his}} hand, or take 1<sprite index=59> and 1<sprite index=60>.
Flavor: A deathly chill from below engulfs you, attempting to suck your life force away.
Name: Touch of the Ancient One

Flavor: In this forgotten place, even the creatures of the night seem older, wiser... and hungrier.
Name: Bats Horde

Flavor: In the forgotten depths, where light never reaches, hunger reigns with fangs and claws.
Name: Cave Dweller

Flavor: In the darkness, you are not the hunter... you are the prey.
Name: Hungry Rat Fiend

Description: {{The Investigator}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=55>3. For each point {{the Investigator}} fails by, {{he}} take 1<sprite index=59>.
Name: Tunnel of Claws

Description: {{The Investigator}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=57>3. For each point {{the Investigator}} fails by, {{he}} take 1<sprite index=60>.
Name: Rotting Corpse

Description: Each round, the first time {{the Investigator}} uses a Move, Attack, or Elude, it costs 1 additional . At the end of {{the Investigator}}'s turn, {{he}} makes a Challenge 3. If the Challenge succeeds, <<01164>> is discarded.
Name: Terror in the Dark

Description:
{{The Investigator}} cannot play Supplies or Conditions.
At the end of the round, <<01165>> is discarded.
Name: Tormenting Echoes

Description: Current Plot removes 1<sprite index=40> and may finish
Flavor: Dark forces stir against you. If you do not act quickly, a sinister plot will be fulfilled.
Name: Dark songs

Description: {{The Investigator}} makes a Challenge <sprite index=57>4. If the Challenge fails, {{the Investigator}} discard 1 asset in play. {{He}} takes 2<sprite index=59> instead if {{he}} cannot discard.
Flavor: The supernatural cold threatens to freeze your soul.
Name: Soulfreeze

Attached Place gets +2<sprite index=56>.
After attached Place is successfully investigated, <<01168>> is discarded.

The attached Place cannot be Investigated.

{{The Investigator}} choose one:

<sprite index=8> : {{The Investigator}} takes 2<sprite index=60>.
